title: EPC URIs
description: DEPRECATED - contains reference to deprecated schema epc-uri-sscc-0.1.0. Use epc-uri-sgtin-or-sscc-0.2.0 instead. Specifies set of values for the epcList, childEPCs or parentID field, expressed as any GS1 Key based EPC scheme in EPC URI (URN) format, relevant for all sectors.
